Room.Name: Wall Road West
Room.ShortDescription: Wall Road West runs between the western wall and an animal training compound.
Room.LongDescription: There are some very strange beasts kept in there, and not all of them are happy to be there. The noise can be horrendous at times. The Brownhaven militia has given the owner of the compound a contract to train copper dragons as mounts. When its done properly, they make excellent steeds for flying patrols high over the village. When its not done properly, the dragons eat their riders. It's a tough life.
